Container.Name: velotron-converter
Container.Overview: Monitors Velotron .pwx files and converts to .tcx/.fit
Container.Description: Monitors /data/original (host /mnt/user/dropBox/original) and converts .pwx files to Strava-compatible .tcx and .fit files.

Config.Name: Monitor Directory
Config.Description: Select your Unraid Share/Folder here. This maps it to '/veloMonitor' inside the container.

Config.Name: Internal Container Path (DO NOT CHANGE)
Config.Description: This tells the script to look at '/veloMonitor'. Unraid maps your folder to '/veloMonitor' automatically.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID to run as (Default 99 for Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID to run as (Default 100 for Unraid)
